definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be high, exalted (NH id. (Hiph.), Aram. [[גְּבַהּ]], cf. Ar. jabhah;un forehead, jabah;un prominence of forehead; compare perhaps also As. gabâni, heights (?) Lotz:TP 133)—
be high, lofty, tall, e.g. tree Ez Eze 19:11, Eze 31:5, Eze 31:10, Eze 31:14, heavens Job 35:5, Is 55:9, Ps 103:11, man 1Sa 10:23.
be exalted, of man in dignity and honour Job 36:7, of servant of Yahweh Is 52:13, God Is 5:16, God's ways Is 55:9.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: in a good sense, encouraged in the ways of Yahweh 2Ch 17:6;

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: elsewhere in a bad sense, be haughty Ps 131:1, Pr 18:12, 2Ch 26:16, 2Ch 32:25, Ez Eze 28:2, Eze 28:5, Eze 28:17, and so without [[לב]] Is 3:16, Je 13:15, Ez Eze 16:50, Zep 3:11.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הִגְבַּהְתִּי]] Ez Eze 17:24; Impf. [[יַגְבִּיהַּ]] Job 39:27, Je 49:16, Ob:Ob 4; [[וַיַּגְבִּיהֶהָ]] 2Ch 33:14; [[יַגְבִּיהוּ]] Job 5:7; Inf. [[הַגְבֵּהַּ]] Is 7:11, Ez Eze 21:31; Pt. [[מַגְבִּיהַּ]] Pr 17:19, Ps 113:5; —make high, exalt, e.g. trees Ez Eze 17:24, wall 2Ch 33:14, gate Pr 17:19, nest Je 49:16, Ob:Ob 4, dwelling Ps 103:5, a request Is 7:11, the lowly Ez Eze 21:31; [[יַגְבִּיהוּ עוּף]] make their flight high, soar aloft Job 5:7, without [[עוף]] Job 39:27.
